DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether certain clock-gene ( HPER3 ) 5/5 genotype carry high risk post-operative cognitive dysfunction .
DOC.brief_title: Study Correlation Between Specific Genes Cognitive Dysfunction After Surgery
DOC.criteria: patient undergoing noncardiac nonneurological surgery either regional general anesthesia daily use major tranquilizer antipsychotic medication know disease CNS score less 24/30 point MMSE
